description: As a System Analyst with a Bachelor's degree in Information Systems in years of experience as a Fullstack Developer, my passion lies in creating simple engaging and dynamic front-end experiences that delight users.

As someone who has fallen in love with blockchain technology, cryptocurrencies, and AI, I am excited about the potential of these technologies to work together and shape the decentralized future of Web 3.0.

In my free time, I enjoy indulging in my hobbies of watching anime, reading manga, and playing games like Terraria and Metroidvania games, which allow me to escape into fantastic worlds and explore new realities.
